item.title: Npcs talking
item.dc:creator: @p_k_j00 p k j00
item.description:
@p_k_j00 wrote:

i am having trouble with my npcs to say if im online or offline. at the moment they just say ‘Owner is offline’.
this is my code

if (npcs[i].npcType == 3451) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("P K J00")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner P K J00 is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner P K J00 is OFFLINE"; } } }

so can someone please tell me whats wrong…
